item.title: ASIN: B0771TBDPL
item.author: invalid@example.com (hard-worker)
item.dc:creator: hard-worker
item.content:encoded:
Trying to get a book to sell is difficult. My title is a common thing done daily by many, many people. The magazine's that I read when I was younger had so many people posing in this position.
Maybe I'm not advertising cool enough and have to up my game. It might be the time to spend money on a waisted space advertiser.

item.title: Apextv on internet video
item.author: invalid@example.com (hard-worker)
item.dc:creator: hard-worker
item.content:encoded:
Whether any of the videos that Apextv releases are real or not, I mention that there is a great amount of dedication being shown to the time travel subject by this group. Apextv surprised me. I just take a look once in a while and see what's new on apextv.
I have nothing to gain mentioning Apextv. This is an unpaid promotional , way to go guys, from me.

item.title: The Backtrack
item.author: invalid@example.com (elretroceso)
item.dc:creator: elretroceso
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone!

Any of you have read The Backtrack?
It's a novelette about time travel that explains a way to travel that you have never seen before. It's written as an autobiography, and like the presentation says:

In these pages I recount my experiences to serve as a manual for all those who can travel back in time.
I hope my story will make your lives easier than mine has been.



It's a translation of my original Spanish book El Retroceso...

The Backtrack

item.title: Anyone interested in a sample chapter from my book? It puts a crazy spin on the JFK assassination!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dwayne Adams)
item.dc:creator: Dwayne Adams
item.content:encoded:
THE FINAL FLIGHT OF AIR FORCE ONE: By Dwayne Adams

NOVEMBER 23, 1963
Dallas, Texas

The moment William Greer drove the limousine west on Elm Street and passed the Texas Book Depository Building, his third eye began to throb. He looked at his wrist and saw the time on his watch: 12:23 pm.

“Well, Mr. President. You can’t say Dallas doesn’t love you…” he overheard the governor’s wife, Nellie Connally saying, as she turns around and looks at Jack Kennedy in the back of the limo with First...

Anyone interested in a sample chapter from my book? It puts a crazy spin on the JFK assassination!

item.title: Short Stories: The Last Report pts. I & II (by Dwayne Adams)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dwayne Adams)
item.dc:creator: Dwayne Adams
item.content:encoded:
When the future of 2015 is threatened by the death of president, John F. Kennedy, in the past, a time traveler sends their mind back in time, to warn the Order of Cronus, in 1963, three days before the assassination. Things go wrong when the time traveler ends up in the body of a drug addicted, schizophrenic. See what happens in the prequel series, to my upcoming novel.

Short Story: The Last Report pt...

Short Stories: The Last Report pts. I & II (by Dwayne Adams)

item.title: The Last Report pt.II: Agent Li
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dwayne Adams)
item.dc:creator: Dwayne Adams
item.content:encoded:
After collecting the Chrononaut Report from Marjorie, Agent Li must deliver it to the Order of Cronus. With limited protection and no backup, the agent must escape the 3rd dimension before psychic vampires find him.
Short Story: The Last Report pt.II

item.title: The Beginning of My End...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dwayne Adams)
item.dc:creator: Dwayne Adams
item.content:encoded:
It all ended on September 11, 2001.

I remember watching the second plane crashing into the other tower, live on television. I jumped out of my chair and yelled, “OH NO!” As cheesy as it sounds, those were the words that came out my mouth.

Fear infected me as well as millions of others around the world. What if we were next, I asked myself everyday after the attacks. One day, while at my job, as an orderly, a man (early 50’s) whose mother I was caring for that day, started a strange...

The Beginning of My End...

item.title: Outta Time: Midnight Fantasy Poetry Reading
item.author: invalid@example.com (PaulaJedi)
item.dc:creator: PaulaJedi
item.content:encoded:
Cosmo posted a new blog entry

Outta Time: Midnight Fantasy Poetry Reading


Sensual pleasure, upon a grave
The church bell bongs, the midnight craze
that sets the scene for strangest love
That awakens every rotting bone.
A fog that hides the lover's face
adds to the mystery of this place
which holds the dead, the painful dread
of being caught, but oh please hush...

Outta Time: Midnight Fantasy Poetry Reading

It will be your job as an agent to strategically place sequences of video links all over Twitter and spread the music of the resurrection recovery agency. Hi folks not been on for a while as I've been putting the finishing touches to my e-book on Amazon. It goes live on wed 1st july but can be pre-ordered 99p (or 99c in U.S)


If I had to pigeon hole it..... sci-fi/steampunk/timetravel/alternative-timeline...... a 9000 word novella... It has at times reached the top 20 in the U.K Top 100 Sci-Fi/Steam punk


hope a link is ok? if not... mods please remove (and slap my wrists)


U.K Amazon...

Been writing......
